column2: an A.M. Eatery////She whispered something to another lady
column3: who waited about 30 secs before coming up to me.  The other lady  said she would get me fresh hash browns.   She apologized and said it's a very cold day and the hash browns werent as hot as normal.  I took a bite and said no these are very hot.   It is clear the plate sat out too long before bring it to my table.  Basically  no response after that.
